metadata.title: CVE-2020-13848 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Portable UPnP SDK (aka libupnp) 1.12.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted SSDP message due to a NULL pointer dereference in the functions FindServiceControlURLPath and FindServiceEventURLPath in genlib/service_table/service_table.c.

criterions.comment: pupnp-1.8 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
